name: Chris Jones
description: my name is Mr Chris Jones from England. I am a man who is loving,caring,honest, romantic,committed,devoted,loyal,faithful and trust worthy that i will give my love to and am willing to relocate with the right person when i meet her.I am honest and expect the same in return so i will her to be very honest with me from the beginning.I don’t play games with peoples Emotion so i will not like you to play games with me either.
